page.title: 13SCRAP METAL.
page.content: A new{industry}in our area which is growing bigger and bigger is the{scrap {metal trade.}There are about seven {scrap merchants}in our area and these are all found near the{docks. Sometimes cars are in a bad crash and they cannot be driven anymore so they are taken to a{scrap merchant.}All the {scrap metal}is dumped in a big yard and it is crushed to make it smaller. Lorries then take the{metal}to the {docks}and it is crushed even more.The {scrap}is loaded onto very large ships and it is taken all over the world. The{scrap merchants}sell tonnes and tonnes of the old metal to{America, {South America, Spain and Japan.}Scrap is worth a lot of money. From rubbish the{merchant}is making millions of pounds. {(James Evans)
